_header: Were there either in this toun
_description: A toast to his mistress — eighteen lines

BodRawD913.First Lines:
Wer þer ouþer in þis tounAle or
                    win…
BodRawD913.Last Lines:
…þe man that leset þat he leuethym is al soso
                    sse me lerdene no more i n[e] canbut crist ich hire
                    bitecheþat was my lemman
